alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:07PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dale, northeastern Geneva and northwestern Houston Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 907 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Pinckard, or 8 miles west of Dothan, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dothan, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Slocomb, Cowarts, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Grimes, Napier Field, Memphis, Hollis Dairy Road, Wilson Mill, Keytons, Light, Smyrna, Wicksburg, Green Acres and Bald Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
